snippet.title: PECKER - Announcement trailer
snippet.description:
Take flight into the three-dimensional whimsy of Pecker, a game where platforming prowess meets innovative mechanics. Here, you're equipped with a marvel of nature – a bendable beak that’s your key to victory. Traverse enchanting medieval landscapes, each teeming with its own unique biomes. Unravel the mysteries that lie hidden within these ancient realms, engage with their quirky inhabitants, and choose your path – combat your adversaries or cleverly bypass them.

As you hop, peck, and puzzle your way through this world, you'll gather shiny coins and uncover hidden treasures. Pecker's World caters to all – whether you're here to absorb the serene gameplay at your own pace or you're aiming to etch your name atop the speedrun leaderboards.

Playable solo or in merry split-screen camaraderie, Pecker's World is not just a game – it's a doorway to a place where fun takes flight, and your beak leads the way!

Pecker will enter Early Access on Steam on 06. May 2024 and will be released on Steam and the Epic Store at the end of the year. Xbox and Switch will follow in 2025.  Pecker will be playable in English, German, French, Italian, Spanish, Japanese, Chinese, Korean and Russian.

A demo is currently available on Steam.
